EnhancedContent:
Hi, I toggled on the "new" AI foundry experience. But it just gives me a blank page.

I cannot disable it and go back to the old view though.

When I go to https://ai.azure.com/ it takes me to the "nextgen" page (e.g. https://ai.azure.com/nextgen/?wsid=%2Fsubscriptions...)

Removing "nextgen" from the URL just redirects me back to the "nextgen" version.

This also happens to my colleague, and we can't use the Foundry.

Can you help?
Description:
Hi, I toggled on the "new" AI foundry experience. But it just gives me a blank page.

I cannot disable it and go back to the old view though.

When I go to [https://ai.azure.com/](https://ai.azure.com/) it takes me to the "nextgen" page (e.g. [https://ai.azure.com/nextgen/?wsid=%2Fsubscriptions...)](https://ai.azure.com/nextgen/?wsid=%2Fsubscriptions...%29)

Removing "nextgen" from the URL just redirects me back to the "nextgen" version.

This also happens to my colleague, and we can't use the Foundry.

Can you help?
Author: MoeCPr
Title: Blank screen in "new" AI Foundry and unable to go back to "classic" view
